channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22201] ConvertJoinMapJoin#checkShuffleSizeForLargeTable throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if no big table is selected
item.description:
In case when bigTableCandidateSet is empty e.g. full outer join, we end up calling checkShuffleSizeForLargeTable with bigTablePosition as -1, resulting in ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.

Also, should we return as soon as we see bigTableCandidateSet is empty ?
item.summary: ConvertJoinMapJoin#checkShuffleSizeForLargeTable throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if no big table is selected

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
